page.title: 19OFFMORE FIRST SCHOOL.
page.content: Children aged 8 and 9 have contributed pages under the guidance of Mrs.Wright and Mr.Crump.The pages were collated from work submitted by Claire Baker, Susan Sherrard,Michelle Wynne,Matthew Darby,Christopher Perks,Adrian Jeffs, Kate Coleman,Paul Williams,Eleanor Hackett,Michael Bylett,Joanne Penn, Deborah Bryant,Emma Guest,Samantha Robinson,Simon Hughes,Nicola White, Andrew Forth,Mark Bullingham,Lee Hatton,Sara Poultney and Mark Reeves with ideas from many others. The School is non-denominational and was opened in 1970. In addition to the headteacher there are nine staff and 280 children on roll.The school secretary works 18 hours and an ancillary 8 hours.There is one caretaker and a cleaner who works 9.75 hours.7 "pink ladies" help supervise at lunchtime.
